title: Ex otio negotium. Or, Martiall his epigrams translated. With sundry poems and fancies, / by R. Fletcher.
author: Martial.
publisher: Printed by T. Mabb, for William Shears, and are to be sold at the Bible in Bedford street in Covent-garden,
notes: Translated and with additional original poems by Fletcher.
Title page in red and black.
The frontispiece is signed: Ro: Vaughan sculpsit.
"Momus elencticus" (caption title) begins new pagination on *1r.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
